com.threerings.nexus.net
Interface Downstream

All Superinterfaces:
Streamable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Downstream.DispatchEvent, Downstream.ObjectCleared, Downstream.ServiceFailure, Downstream.ServiceResponse, Downstream.Subscribe, Downstream.SubscribeFailure
public interface Downstream
extends Streamable

A base interface for all messages received from a server.

Nested Class Summary
static class Downstream.DispatchEvent
          Notifies the client of an event originating from the server.
static interface Downstream.Handler
          Used to dispatch downstream messages.
static class Downstream.ObjectCleared
          Delivers an object cleared notification from the server.
static class Downstream.ServiceFailure
          Delivers a failure response to a service call from the server.
static class Downstream.ServiceResponse
          Delivers a response to a service call from the server.
static class Downstream.Subscribe
          A successful response to a subscription request.
static class Downstream.SubscribeFailure
          A failure response to a subscription request.
